name: reasoning-agent-workspace
description: A modern browser-based chat interface for an AI reasoning agent with extended thinking capabilities, inspired by Claude Desktop

scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && node sse-server.js" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
